    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl that return SubprogramDecl
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SubprogramDecl SubprogramContext.getSubprogramDecl()
    Returns the subprogram declaration currently being parsed.
    SubprogramDecl Parser.parseSubprogramDecl()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    subprogramDecl = procedureDecl | functionDecl .
    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl that return types with arguments of type SubprogramDecl
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<SubprogramDecl> Parser.parseSubprogramDecls()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    subprogramDecls = ( subprogramDecl )* .
